course module¶

class course.Course(course_name, instructor=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to represent a Course in the School Management System.

The Course class manages course-related information such as the course name, the assigned instructor, and the students enrolled in the course.

course_name¶

The name of the course.

Type:

str

instructor¶

The instructor assigned to the course. Defaults to None if no instructor is assigned.

Type:

Instructor, optional

enrolled_students¶

A list of students enrolled in the course.

Type:

list

add_student(student)[source]¶

Adds a student to the course if they are not already enrolled.

add_student(student)[source]¶

Adds a student to the course if they are not already enrolled.

This method checks if the student is already enrolled in the course. If not, the student is added to the list of enrolled students.

Parameters:

student (Student) – An instance of the Student class representing the student to be added to the course.

Raises:

ValueError – If the student is already enrolled in the course.

School Management System
